text: Joana Filipa Gaspar Silva Marchão (born 24 October 1996) is a Portuguese footballer who plays as a defender for Sporting CP. She has appeared for the Portugal women's national team. ==Career== Marchão has been capped for the Portugal national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Joana Marchão at Portuguese Football Federation (FPF) * Joana Marchão at Sporting CP Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese women's footballers Category:Portugal women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Campeonato Nacional de Futebol Feminino players Category:Sporting CP (women) footballers Category:People from Abrantes Category:Atlético Ouriense players
title: Joana Marchão
